00033 class Camera : 
00034     public Node
00035 {
00036 public:
00040     struct Statistics
00041     {
00043         int visualsBeforeCull;
00045         int visualsAfterCull;
00046 
00048         void reset();
00049     } statistics;
00050 
00051     /*
00052      * Temporary buffers used in rendering.
00053      */
00054     class TempBuffers
00055     {
00056     public:
00057         NS(lang,Array)<NS(math,float4x4)>       bonematrices;
00058         NS(lang,Array)<NS(math,float4x4)*>  bonematrixp;
00059     };

00219      * Returns camera temporary buffers used in rendering.

00221     TempBuffers&            tempBuffers() const             {return m_temp;}
00222 
00223     /*
00224      * Returns list of visible visuals in last rendering.
00225      * Warning: Objects might not exist anymore.
00226      */
00227     const NS(lang,Array)<Visual*>&  visuals() const         {return m_visuals;}
00228 
00229 private:
00230     /* Helper class used to sort visuals. */
00231     class VisualSorter
00232     {
00233     public:
00234         Visual* obj;
00235         float   depth;
00236 
00237         bool    operator<( const VisualSorter& other ) const    {return depth < other.depth;}
00238     };
00239 
00240     ViewFrustum             m_frustum;
00241     NS(math,float3x4)       m_worldtm;
00242     NS(math,float3x4)       m_viewtm;
00243     NS(math,float4x4)       m_viewprojtm;

00246 
00247     NS(lang,Array)<NS(math,float3x4)>   m_worldTransformCache; // used by cacheTransforms

00249     NS(lang,Array)<Visual*>             m_visuals; // used by simple render
00250     NS(lang,Array)<NS(gr,Shader)*>      m_shaders; // used by simple render
00251     NS(lang,Array)<int>                 m_priorities; // used by simple render
00252     LightSorter                         m_lightSorter; // used by simple render
00253     LightSorter*                        m_lightSorterPtr; // used by getLightsSortedByDistance
00254     NS(lang,Array)<VisualSorter>        m_visualSorter; // used by cullVisuals
